TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BackupFileType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types and taken as a parameter of the member.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.Backup.BackupFileType Directory = int32(2)

summary.para: During a full restore, indicates that the file system object being restored is a directory.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.Backup.BackupFileType File = int32(1)

summary.para: During a full restore, indicates that the file system object being restored is an ordinary file.
